Html: I love this application, but the Warlock application is not working with your new release of 2.2.14.  Yes, I do agree that Warlocks need some serious attention here, but I will continue to come back.

/facepalm

We've reported this issue SEVERAL TIMES already in both discussions and the issue tracker. We've already fixed it for 2.2.15 and Astrylian has already posted notices that Warlocks should use 2.2.13 until the next release.
